title: Find Your Niche & Choose a Platform
description: Identify a topic you are passionate and knowledgeable about (e.g., tech, food, travel, comedy, education). Choose a primary platform that suits your style (e.g., YouTube for long videos, TikTok/Instagram for short videos, a blog for writing).

title: Learn Core Content Skills & Start Creating
description: Develop the fundamental skills for your chosen platform. This could be video shooting and editing, writing and SEO, or graphic design. The most important step is to start creating content consistently to find your voice and improve your craft.

title: Build a Community & Grow Your Audience
description: Focus on creating value for your audience and engaging with them. Respond to comments, ask for feedback, and build a loyal community. Consistency is key to growing your follower/subscriber base. You may start getting small brand collaboration offers.
qualifications: A growing and engaged audience (e.g., 10k+ followers)
institutes: Collaborating with other Sri Lankan creators

title: Monetize and Diversify
description: With a significant audience, you can monetize more effectively. This includes larger brand partnerships, affiliate marketing, selling your own digital products (e-books, courses) or merchandise. Don't rely on a single income stream.

title: Build a Business Around Your Brand
description: Transition from being a creator to an entrepreneur. This could mean launching a product line, starting a media company, a consultancy service, or an agency based on your expertise. You'll hire a team to manage operations while you focus on the creative vision.
